Detailed Description

ApoxiCommandAction analyzes if the input string has the meaning of an APOXI command string, that means it fullfills the following syntax: ****cmdno* [cmdstring*], where cmdno is an integer in the range from 1 to 99999 and cmdstring is a optional commandstring which must be finished by a '*'.
